prod_short_desc: Fill up your city with people!
prod_long_desc:
Grow your city's population with this great pack, featuring a wide range of minifigures and endless possibilities for activities, with playground equipment, a picnic table, bench and a hot dog stand. Includes 14 minifigures, plus baby and dog figures.
Build a colorful park setting full of buildable models and 14 fun minifigure characters!
Make a spinning merry-go-round, park bench, picnic table, hot dog cart, lawnmower, wheelchair, baby stroller, and more
Includes 14 LEGO City minifigure characters, plus baby and dog figures and lots of accessories
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
157 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 5 and 12 years old
set: Fun in the park - City People Pack
